fields.name: Cotton
fields.description: Cotton is a soft, fluffy staple fiber that grows in a boll, or protective case, around the seeds of the cotton plants of the genus Gossypium in the mallow family Malvaceae.
fields.why_its_bad: Cotton is a water-intensive crop. It takes about 2,700 liters of water to produce enough cotton for a single t-shirt. Cotton is also a pesticide-intensive crop. It uses about 16% of the world's insecticides and 7% of pesticides. Cotton is also a very labor-intensive crop. It is often grown in developing countries where labor laws are not enforced.
fields.why_its_good: Cotton is a natural fiber that is biodegradable. It is also a renewable resource. Cotton is also a very versatile fabric that can be used for a variety of products.

fields.name: Polyester
fields.description: Polyester is a synthetic fiber that is made from petroleum-based products. It is a very durable fabric that is resistant to shrinking and stretching.
fields.why_its_bad: Polyester is a non-biodegradable fabric that is made from petroleum-based products. It is also a very energy-intensive fabric to produce. It takes about 70 million barrels of oil to produce enough polyester for the world's clothing needs. Polyester is also a very water-intensive fabric to produce. It takes about 70 liters of water to produce enough polyester for a single t-shirt.
fields.why_its_good: Polyester is a very durable fabric that is resistant to shrinking and stretching. It is also a very versatile fabric that can be used for a variety of products.

fields.name: Wool
fields.description: Wool is a natural fiber that is made from the fleece of sheep. It is a very warm and durable fabric that is resistant to shrinking and stretching.
fields.why_its_bad: Wool is a non-vegan fabric that is made from the fleece of sheep. It is also a very energy-intensive fabric to produce. It takes about 100 liters of water to produce enough wool for a single sweater. Wool is also a very labor-intensive fabric to produce. It is often produced in developing countries where labor laws are not enforced.
fields.why_its_good: Wool is a natural fiber that is biodegradable. It is also a renewable resource. Wool is also a very warm and durable fabric that is resistant to shrinking and stretching.
